name: Vlaamse Nieuwsmedia
goal: Vlaamse Nieuwsmedia is an organisation representing and promoting the interests of the Flemish newspaper publishers in Belgium.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Freedom of Press, Audiovisual Media Services Directive, Commercial and advertising, Contract law and freedom to contract, Copyright, Data Protection, Digital single market, VAT, Fair Competition and Public Service Broadcasters, Freedom of Information, Print and Environment
